= Introduction =

The project has not been released to any artifact repository yet. As such you have to go through a few more steps to get going.

The plugin name is `velocity` and there is a single goal `velocity`

= Overview =
  # Check out a copy of the plugin from [[http://velocity-maven-plugin.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ subversion].
  # Run maven install on the plugin.
  # Add the plugin information to your pom (see the next section).
  # You can now run the plugin with 'mvn velocity:velocity'

= Example Addition to POM =
{{{
			<plugin>
				<groupId>se.slide.maven</groupId>
				<artifactId>velocity-maven-plugin</artifactId>
				<version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
				<configuration>
					<templateFiles>
						<directory>/src/main/resources</directory>
						<includes>
							<include>*.vm</include>
						</includes>
					</templateFiles>
					<templateValues>
						<test>foo</test>
					</templateValues>
				</configuration>
			</plugin>
}}}

= Options =
||Option Name||Default||Notes||
||Encoding||${project.build.sourceEncoding}||This option also has null check that sets the value to "UTF-8"||
||OutputDirectory||${project.build.directory}||
||TemplateFiles||*Required, no default.*||This is required, but a default may be added later||
||TemplateValues||*Required, no default.*||This is the properties list you wish to have merged with your templates||
